newsitem.title: UK: BOE invites band 1,2 bills, shortage 400 mln stg.
newsitem.headline: BOE invites band 1,2 bills, shortage 400 mln stg.

text.p: The Bank of England invited UK money market operators to offer band 1 and 2 bills in exchange for cash to help alleviate a forecast 400 million stg liquidity shortage in the market.
